Metrics and targets
Disclosure Requirement E4-4 â€“ Targets related to biodiversity and ecosystems
29. The undertaking shall disclose the biodiversity and ecosystem-related targets it has set.
30. The objective of this Disclosure Requirement is to allow an understanding of the targets the
undertaking has adopted to support its biodiversity and ecosystems policies and address its
material related impacts, dependencies, risks and opportunities.
